content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': "This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI used the 'execute_shell' command to create the 'martial_arts' directory, but it returned an empty string for both STDOUT and STDERR. My assistant suggested using the 'list_files' command to check if the directory was successfully created. They provided a plan to use the 'list_files' command and proceed with the next step of our plan if the directory exists, or investigate why it was not created if it does not."}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command list_files returned: []'}, {'role': 'assistant', 'content': '{\n    "thoughts": {\n        "text": "The \'martial_arts\' directory was not created. We should investigate why this happened before proceeding with our plan.",\n        "reasoning": "The \'execute_shell\' command did not return any errors, so it\'s possible that the directory was not created due to a permissions issue or some other problem. It\'s important to investigate the issue before proceeding to avoid any further problems.",\n        "plan": "- Investigate why the \'martial_arts\' directory was not created.\\n- Once the issue is resolved, proceed with the next step of our plan.",\n        "criticism": "I should have checked the permissions of the directory before running the \'execute_shell\' command to ensure that I had the necessary permissions to create the directory.",\n        "speak": "The \'martial_arts\' directory was not created. We need to investigate the issue before proceeding with our plan."\n    },\n    "command": {\n        "name": ""\n    }\n}'}]
